gift_analysis.description: A white marble or granite surface with gray veining and some dark spots or stains. There is a person's leg/foot visible wearing dark colored pants or shoes standing on the surface. In the bottom right corner, there appears to be a burgundy or dark red colored object, possibly a tool handle or similar item. The top portion shows what appears to be wooden flooring or material and white tiled walls in the background.

affinity_reason: DANGER! DANGER! I see a human leg in this picture and humans are absolutely terrifying! I must flee immediately - this is way too scary for a dodo like me!
